Sensor Simulation

Sensor Simulation contains any Sensor simulation components in the FPGA that you add. Sensor simulation defines the sensors to be simulated.

What do you want to do?

Change FPGA address

To change the FPGA target address, change the value in the control FPGA Name found on the page below. An example name would be RIO0. Please note, upon creation, if you selected an FPGA personality that was already added to the system definition under Chassis/FPGA, this FPGA Name needs to match.

View or change the xVDTs

To view or change the xVDTs, select the name of your xVDT item in the configuration tree. The xVDT page appears to the right of the configuration tree. The item is named xVDT to indicate the same IP works for several different physical simulations like RVDT and LVDT.

For more information about adding and configuring custom devices, refer to the Configuring and Running a Project book of the NI VeriStand Help, available by selecting Help»Search the NI VeriStand Help.
